statements: SELECT investment_id, investment_amount, interest_rate, investment_duration, completed FROM Investment_Calculations WHERE investment_id = 1;
SELECT investment_id, investment_amount, interest_rate, investment_duration, completed FROM Investment_Calculations WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Calculations WHERE investment_amount >= 10000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT investment_id, investment_amount FROM Investment_Calculations WHERE interest_rate > 0.5 AND investment_duration < 5;
SELECT investment_id, investment_duration, completed FROM Investment_Calculations WHERE interest_rate < 0.1 ORDER BY investment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Calculations WHERE investment_id = 1;
SELECT investment_id, investment_amount, interest_rate FROM Investment_Calculations WHERE completed = true ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT investment_id, SUM(investment_amount) as total_investment, AVG(interest_rate) as avg_interest FROM Investment_Calculations GROUP BY investment_id;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Calculations WHERE interest_rate > 5 AND investment_duration >= 3;
SELECT AVG(interest_rate) as avg_rate, COUNT(*) as total_investments FROM Investment_Calculations WHERE completed = false;
SELECT * FROM investments;
SELECT investment_id, investment_amount, interest_rate FROM investments ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT investment_id, investment_type FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT investment_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY investment_id;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE investment_type = 'Stocks' ORDER BY investment_id DESC;
SELECT investment_amount, interest_rate FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 10000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM investments;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT investment_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY investment_id HAVING total_transactions > 5000;
SELECT * FROM investments;
SELECT investment_id, amount FROM investments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT investment_id, interest_rate FROM investments ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT investment_id, SUM(profit_amount) AS total_profit FROM profits GROUP BY investment_id;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY interest_rate DESC;
SELECT investment_id, amount FROM investments WHERE interest_rate > 5.0;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN investments ON transactions.investment_id = investments.investment_id WHERE transaction_amount > 5000;
SELECT investment_id, SUM(profit_amount) AS total_profit FROM profits GROUP BY investment_id HAVING total_profit > 20000 ORDER BY total_profit DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS transaction_count, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT * FROM investments ORDER BY investor_name ASC;
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investments WHERE investment_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM investment_statistics WHERE total_profit_amount < 1000;
SELECT investor_name, interest_rate FROM investments WHERE interest_rate BETWEEN 3.5 AND 5.5;
SELECT I.*, IR.amount FROM investments I JOIN investment_records IR ON I.id = IR.investment_id;
SELECT * FROM investments ORDER BY investor_name DESC, investment_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT investor_name, SUM(investment_amount) AS total_investment FROM investments GROUP BY investor_name HAVING total_investment > 5000;

SELECT IR.transaction_date, IR.transaction_type, IR.amount, IC.profit_amount FROM investment_records IR JOIN profit_calculation IC ON IR.investment_id = IC.investment_id WHERE IC.profit_amount > 1000 ORDER BY IR.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM investments WHERE interest_rate BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1 AND id IN (SELECT investment_id FROM profit_calculation WHERE profit_amount > 2000);

SELECT IS.investment_id, IS.total_investment_amount, IS.total_profit_amount, I.investor_name FROM investment_statistics IS JOIN investments I ON IS.investment_id = I.id WHERE IS.total_profit_amount > IS.total_investment_amount;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Account;
SELECT user_id, investment_amount FROM Investment_Account ORDER BY investment_amount DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Investment_User WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT account_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM Investment_Transaction GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Interest WHERE interest_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Investment_Account;
SELECT user_id, investment_amount FROM Investment_Account WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT account_id, SUM(profit_amount) AS total_profit FROM Investment_Profit GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_profit > 5000;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Investment_User WHERE username LIKE 'john%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM Investment_Transaction ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
